TopicTitle: KSP 0.25 shuts down for unknown reason

Articles.Content:
While playing the KSP shuts down for an unknown reason.

I'm using linux (ubuntu) and i haven't got any other problems with other games or applications.

I haven't put any mod to the game.

Is there anything that you suggest me to do in order to solve this problem?

thanks!

edit: i have noted that, this only happens when i play the game from the launcher

it doesn't happens when i play from the "KSP.X86"

- - - Updated - - -

i think of that, the next updates of KSP should be done for the bug fixings that it needs.

Edited December 30, 2014 by giannis1996
I have found when it happens and how to make it to not happen
Squad don't support .25 any more, the update for .25 is .90, so if .90 is working like you say above then this is fixed
